description: Suga is one of very talented and He is a South Korean rapper, songwriter and also music producer. He studied in Taejeon Elementary School, Gwaneum Middle School, and  Apgujeong High School.

Rm is the oldest member means he is the first who join and main rapper among the them since 2010 and the leader of the group. He is a song writer and music producer. His Rapping skill is amazing that’s why he  formerly called as rap monster by his fans.
Jin loves to play games, take selfies and cook
J-Hope likes to listen to music on his free time and participated in the underground dance team Neuron and won prizes for his dance.
Jimin was born in Busan, South Korea. He graduated with a bachelor of film and theatre at Busan High School of Arts and Global Cyber University.
V stands for Victory. He was born in Daegu. He made his acting debut with a supporting role or character in “KBS2‘s historical drama Hwarang: The Poet Warrior Youth”  with  his real name in 2017.

role: Main Vocalist, Lead Dancer. Sub Rapper, Center, Maknae
description:
jungkook is the Main Vocalist, Lead Dancer, Sub Rapper, Center, Maknae And Younger than others. He learned break dance in 5th grade.

He holds a black taekwando belt.when jungkook  was younger he want to be a badminton player. also he received offers from eight different talent agencies  JYP, Big Hit Entertainment ,Cube , Entertainment Starship , FNC, Woolim but  He decides to join Big Hit Entertainment and becomes the the part of the group bangtan boys.
